resources.string:
This is DLA-tree growth visualizer.
 It was build as a Android wallpaper.
 To install wallpaper click the button below.
 Or you can do it manually:
 Settings -> Display -> Wallpaper -> Live Wallpapers -> select "DLA tree live wallpaper"
 
 See detailed explanations concerning DLA here:
 https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Diffusion-limited_aggregation
